_header: I leve on our holy dright
Note: Part of an abstract of Myrc’s Instructions (1581), lines 410-525.

TCD211.First Lines:
I leue yn owre holy dryȝtfader of heuen god al
                    myȝt…
TCD211.Last Lines:
And haue þe Ioy þat lasteþ ayeGod graunte hym self
                    þat I so may
TCD211.Editions:
Bitterling,  Klaus. 
             “An Abstract of John Mirk’s Instructions for Parish
                Priests.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 24 [222] (1977): 146.
